column4: anyone can help me  i have ubuntu server 9.10 and some services dont start but they are configured to start
might help to say which don't start
and why do you think they are set to start?
are there links for them in  /etc/rc2.d?
what does   sudo /etc/init.d/apache start   return?
it is   sudo /etc/init.d/apache2 start
it is a path to the link   /etc/init.d/apache2 start
it might still run - do   ps aux | grep apache
so it is running - in /etc/rc2.d   does the apache link have a k or s at the begginning?
afaik those services should be in the 2nd runlevel - run sysvinit-rc-conf again and check pls
nothing in there to indicate why you have your trouble
nothing in there to indicate why you have your trouble
but it wouldn't show apps not starting - that ubuntuforums link suggested editing a file - did you do that?
when did this prob start?
you could try an apt-get update && upgrade maybe
yep :]
k
is there a file   /etc/innittab   ?
is there a file   /etc/inittab   ?
